com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.impl

Class ConfigStringParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.AbstractConfigParams<java.lang.String,ConfigStringParams>
      • com.github.codelomer.configprotection.model.params.impl.ConfigStringParams

  • public class ConfigStringParams
extends AbstractConfigParams<java.lang.String,ConfigStringParams>
    Represents the parameters for validating and retrieving a string value from a configuration section.
